__e: The three of us just have to help Mom as much as we can.
"We're a family, we have to stick together." And she was right.
If we all stick together and we do our part... We can win this thing?
In the way where l'm furious at him, in the way where l blame myself, in all the little ways I imagine how I could have fixed things.
And if we can stick together, we can make them believe us.
You got to ask yourself when you're hundreds of millions of miles from Earth, and you've just lost the one man who was able to hold you all together, and you know something that nobody else knows.
